configurationProperties.name: TypeOfArtifact
configurationProperties.description: The package type, ex. npm, yum, gem

configurationProperties.name: RepoKey
configurationProperties.description: Name of the repository in which this artifact should be stored

configurationProperties.name: UserName
configurationProperties.description: Username for authenticating with the repository

configurationProperties.name: Password
configurationProperties.description: Password for authenticating with the repository

configurationProperties.name: EmailAddress
configurationProperties.description: Email address used to authenticate with the repository

configurationProperties.name: ArtifactoryHost
configurationProperties.description: Public address of Artifactory host, ex: https://myexamplehost.com
